snippet: A year after a fire killed eight children when it ripped through a Koranic school in Senegal, the government has failed to prosecute those responsible and to halt the abuse of young boys in Islamic education, Human Rights Watch said on Wednesday....

headline.print_headline: Senegal Failing on Pledge to Halt Abuse in Koranic Schools: HRW
headline.main: Senegal Failing on Pledge to Halt Abuse in Koranic Schools: HRW

lead_paragraph: A year after a fire killed eight children when it ripped through a Koranic school in Senegal, the government has failed to prosecute those responsible and to halt the abuse of young boys in Islamic education, Human Rights Watch said on Wednesday.
